charges.charge_description: 18:1591(a) and 2 - Child Sex Trafficking; Aid and Abet(1s-2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is hereby committed to custody of BOP for a term of 198 mos. This term consists of 198 mos on count 1, 198 mos on count 2, 198 mos on count 3 and 198 mos on count 4, all counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release, dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 10 yrs on counts 1, 2, 3 and 4. This term consists of 10 yrs on count 1, 10 yrs on count 2, 10 yrs on count 3 and 10 yrs on count 4, to run concurrently; AMENDED ON 12/16/10 - dft committed to the custody of BOP for a term of ONE HUNDRED EIGHTY (180) MONTHS; This term consists of terms of 180 months on Count 1, 180 months on Count 2, 180 months on Count 3, and 180 months on Count 4, all Counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release, the dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of TEN (10) YEARS on Count 1, 2, 3 and 4. This term consists of terms of 10 years on Count 1, 10 years on Count 2, 10 years on Count 3, and 10 years on Count 4, terms to run concurrently. S/A: $400.00

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of NINETY SEVEN (97) MOS on Counts 1,2,3 and 4, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release the dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of TEN (10) YRS on Counts 1,2,3, and 4, said counts to run concurrently; S/A: $400.00; AMENDED on 12/16/10 - Dft is committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of SEVENTY EIGHT (78) MOS on Counts 1,2,3 and 4, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release the dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of TEN (10) YRS on Counts 1,2,3, and 4, said counts to run concurrently. S/A: $400.00;4/15/2014 Revoke Supervised Release. BOP for a term of 3 Months. Followed by 115 Months of Supervised Release with conditions;11/23/2015 Revoke Supervised Release. BOP for a term of 6 months. Followed by a 90 month term of supervised release;2/27/2017 Revoke Supervised Release. BOP for a term of 17 months consisting of concurrent sentenced of 17 months on each count, no term supervised release to follow
